name: htmx-lite
description: A lightweight feature subset of HTMX, the main value proposition is to make this library safer and easier to get through security reviews, additional benefits may include better performance and smaller bundles, though these are not primary goals.

scripts.publish-major: npm version major && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish
